entry.title: [GLOBAL][Collaborative solutions] - mailstore20 incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 24, 10:10 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Collaborative solutions has been resolved.

Start time : 24/09/2025 08:30 UTC
End time : 24/09/2025 09:30 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a hardware issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 24, 09:34 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Collaborative solutions offer on the specific Zimbra mailstore20.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 24/09/2025 08:30 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some customers may experience timeout errors when using webmail or mail clients.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][SMS] - Sending SMS
entry.content:
Sep 24, 09:24 UTC
Update - Service has been fully restored since 24/09/2025 09:10 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability.
We are pleased to inform you that our Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) service and SMS are now operational again. Additionally, configuration requests are also being processed normally.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 24/09/2025 00:01 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Sending SMS has a malfunction.
Customers Impact : Customers cannot send SMS with 2FA.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 24, 09:07 UTC
Monitoring - Impacted Service(s) : 2FA and the other SMS are operational again. The same goes for the Todo.
Customers Impact : Customers can send SMS again.

Sep 24, 08:31 UTC
Update - Update :
The fix is still in progress.
Service performance is being restored.

Sep 24, 08:06 UTC
Update - Impacted Service(s) : Configuration requests are currently on hold

Sep 24, 07:59 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Sep 24, 07:40 UTC
Update - Impacted Service(s) : Sending/receiving SMS has a malfunction.
Customers Impact : Customers cannot send and receive SMS .

Sep 24, 07:26 UTC
Update - Impacted Service(s) : Sending SMS has a malfunction.
Customers Impact : Customers cannot send SMS .

Sep 24, 07:02 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our SMS offer .

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 24/09/2025 00:01 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Sending SMS with 2FA has a malfunction.
Customers Impact : Customers cannot send SMS with 2FA.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 24, 06:52 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our SMS offer.

Start time : 24/09/2025 00:01 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
